items.question: How long does it take to get my SaaS?
items.answer: On average, 4 weeks from first call to delivery. For more complex projects, it can take up to 6 weeks.

items.question: I know nothing about tech — is that a problem?
items.answer: Not at all! That's actually our favorite type of client. We handle all the technical stuff. You explain your business — we translate that into software.

items.question: What if my needs change after delivery?
items.answer: Your subscription includes updates. Your business evolves, your SaaS evolves with it. We adapt continuously.

items.question: How is this different from Notion, Monday, or a regular CRM?
items.answer: Those tools are generic: they do a bit of everything but nothing specific to your business. Our SaaS is built FOR your business, with the exact vocabulary, processes, and needs of your daily work.

items.question: Do you use AI? Is it reliable?
items.answer: Yes, we use AI to accelerate development and add smart features (suggestions, automations). But AI is a tool, not a replacement: every SaaS is validated by our human team.

items.question: How many people can use the SaaS?
items.answer: As many as you want. We adapt the number of licenses to your team size. From 1 to 50+ users, no problem.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. European hosting, data encryption, daily backups. We take security very seriously.
